stare.000: %Abandoned Bride is staring at the clock but her eyes are unfocused.
nightmarket.000: Look at all these goods of every kind! Wow, I am amazed!$h
rain.000: %Abandoned Bride seems to be having a nightmare.#$b#Blo...od...i...n...my...h...a...n...ds...$6
rain.001: %Abandoned Bride's eyes are half open but she is unconscious.#$b#No...I...did...n't...mean...to...$6
morn.000: %Abandoned Bride suddenly opened her eyes and is staring at you. She is silent but you have a strong feeling that she is asking you for help...
morn.001: %Abandoned Bride is awake but it doesn't look like she will get up anytime soon. It seems like she has been crying over night.
clothing.000: ...Maybe I should make it like...#$b#%Abandoned Bride is mumbling to herself.
spring.000: %Abandoned Bride is crying in her sleep. You can tell that she is in deep sorrow.#$e#Ugh...$6#$b#%Abandoned Bride is aware of you but has no energy to greet you.
looks.000: I have to look nice. Look good... Look appealing to him...$h#$b#...#$b#No! I am a monster! I am a monster!$a
gems.000: I like how gems are so bright and twinkles under light.$h
shop.000: Hello, @. I am here for some groceries and basic supplies.$h
beach.000: Look how wonderful the ocean is. I feel like a little girl again.$h
